        Returns:

        Returns:
        Whether name is in database (true), or not (false)

             java.lang.String name)
        Can be used to rename account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account for being renamed
        name - Desired user name
        Returns:
        Whether account has been successfully renamed

        Method, for locking users Account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account to be locked
        Returns:

        boolean unlock(int id)
        Method, for unlocking users Account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account to be unlocked
        Returns:
        Whether Account has been unlocked successfully

      • locked

        java.lang.Boolean locked(int id)
        Method, for obtaining information, whether Account is locked
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, in which lock state we are interested to
        Returns:
        True, if account is locked and false in other case. null if method fails

      • verifyCredentials

        int verifyCredentials(java.lang.String login,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Verifies credentials, and returns proper user ID
        Parameters:
        login - String, that uniquely identifies account
        pass - Password, that protects account from unauthorized access
        Returns:
        ID of user if properly verified, or -1 in other case

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Account> getAll()

        List list of accounts

      • changePassword

        boolean changePassword(int id,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Changes account password
        Parameters:
        id - Account ID
        password - New password, that will protect account from unauthorized access
        Returns:
        true, if password has been successfully changed, or false in other way

      • changeEmail

        boolean changeEmail(int id,
                  java.lang.String mail)
        Changes E-Mail associated with account
        Parameters:
        id - Account ID
        mail - New E-mail, that will be associated with account
        Returns:
        true, if e-mail has been successfully changed, or false in other way

      • setWarnings

        boolean setWarnings(int id,
                  int warnings)
        Method, that can be used to set appropriate number of warnings for given Account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, for which warns should be modified
        warnings - Number of warnings, for being to for given Account
        Returns:
        true, if warnings have been modified properly, false in other case

      • getWarnings

        int getWarnings(int id)
        Method, for retrieving number of warnings for given Account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, that warning number should be returned
        Returns:
        number of warnings of given Account, or <0 if failed to retrieve

      • setPremium

        boolean setPremium(int id,
                 java.util.Date until)
        Sets up Account premium time limit until given date
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, for which premium time is changed
        until - Date, of potential premium time end
        Returns:
        True, if premium time has been changed successfully, false in other case

      • getPremium

        java.util.Date getPremium(int id)
        Method, that might be used for retrieving premium time end for given Account
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, that premium time we want to retrieve
        Returns:
        Date, when Accounts premium time ends or null if method fails

      • isPremium

        java.lang.Boolean isPremium(int id)
        Call it, if You want to know whether account is still premium or not
        Parameters:
        id - ID of Account, that needs to be checked for premium time
        Returns:
        True, if Account is premium or false in other case
